text: Brian Burns may refer to: * Brian Burns (American football) (born 1998), American football player * Brian Burns (screenwriter), American screenwriter and film producer * Brian D. Burns (born 1939), former Vermont Lieutenant Governor * Bryan E. Burns (born 1970), American archeologist * Brian P. Burns (born 1936), American entrepreneur, attorney and philanthropist ==See also== *Brian Byrne (disambiguation)
title: Brian Burns
